SELECT A.BIN_ProductVendorID AS productVendorId, ISNULL(A.Quantity,0) AS quantity, B.BarCode AS barCode, C.NameTotal AS nameTotal, C.UnitCode AS unitCode, ISNULL(D.Quantity,0) AS curStock,
ISNULL(T0.departStockQuantity,0) AS inDepartStock,
ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),E.SalePrice),0) AS salePrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),E.MemPrice),0) AS memPrice, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),C.StandardCost),0) AS standardCost, ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),C.OrderPrice),0) AS orderPrice, ISNULL((ISNULL(A.Quantity,0) * ISNULL(CONVERT(Decimal(16,2),E.SalePrice),0)),0) AS totalAmount, A.Comments AS reason FROM Inventory.BIN_ProductDeliverDetail A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor B ON A.BIN_ProductVendorID = B.BIN_ProductVendorID LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Product C ON B.BIN_ProductID = C.BIN_ProductID LEFT JOIN Inventory.BIN_ProductStock D ON (A.BIN_ProductVendorID = D.BIN_ProductVendorID AND D.BIN_InventoryInfoID = #depotInfoId# AND D.BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID =#BIN_LogicInventoryInfoID# AND D.ValidFlag='1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductPrice E ON (C.BIN_ProductID = E.BIN_ProductID AND E.Type = '2' AND C.ValidFlag = E.ValidFlag AND GetDate() BETWEEN E.StartDate AND E.EndDate)
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationID, C.BIN_ProductVendorID, SUM(convert(bigint,ISNULL(C.Quantity,0))) AS departStockQuantity FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_InventoryInfo B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID) LEFT JOIN Inventory.BIN_ProductStock C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_InventoryInfoID=C.BIN_InventoryInfoID) WHERE C.ValidFlag='1' GROUP BY A.BIN_OrganizationID, C.BIN_ProductVendorID ) T0 ON(A.BIN_ProductVendorID=T0.BIN_ProductVendorID AND T0.BIN_OrganizationID=#BIN_OrganizationIDReceive#)
WHERE A.BIN_ProductDeliverID =#BIN_ProductDeliverID# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND B.ValidFlag = '1' AND C.ValidFlag = '1'
